Interface BankOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Account, Checking, Credit, Savings

    public interface BankOperations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deposit(double amount)
      Deposits a specified amount into the account.
      double getBalance()
      Retrieves the current balance of the account.
      boolean transfer(BankOperations targetAccount, double amount)
      Transfers a specified amount to another account.
      boolean withdraw(double amount)
      Withdraws a specified amount from the account.

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        void deposit(double amount)
        Deposits a specified amount into the account.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to deposit

      • withdraw

        boolean withdraw(double amount)
        Withdraws a specified amount from the account.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to withdraw
        Returns:
        true if the withdrawal is successful, false otherwise

      • transfer

        boolean transfer(BankOperations targetAccount,
                 double amount)
        Transfers a specified amount to another account.
        Parameters:
        targetAccount - the target account to receive the transfer
        amount - the amount to transfer
        Returns:
        true if the transfer is successful, false otherwise

      • getBalance

        double getBalance()
        Retrieves the current balance of the account.
        Returns:
        the balance of the account
